title: Launch Version 8 (surface app version in UI)

requirements.text: Add an app version constant set to "8" and display it in the UI so users can confirm they are on Version 8.
acceptanceCriteria: The app defines a single source of truth for the app version (e.g., a constant exported from a small module) set to "8".
The Settings page displays the version as English text (e.g., "Version 8").
The desktop footer (in AppLayout) also displays the version as English text (e.g., "Instabook Â· Version 8" or "Version 8").
The version text renders without breaking layout on mobile and desktop.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn/ui) or any other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: No new backend APIs or schema changes.
No changes to authentication, roles, or moderation behavior.
No new branding/logo work unless required for the version label placement.
